events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and will begin the review process shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the engineering team focused on backend developer roles.
A recruiter has been assigned to your case and will contact you soon to discuss next steps.
Your initial screening call has been completed successfully, and we are impressed by your background.
Thank you for your prompt responses and willingness to proceed with the technical interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th at 2 PM. Please prepare accordingly.
You have completed the technical interview with positive feedback regarding your coding and problem-solving skills.
An HR interview has been scheduled for May 10th to discuss company culture and benefit packages.
You have completed the HR interview successfully, and all indicators suggest a good cultural fit.
We have sent you an official offer for the software engineer role with detailed compensation and benefits.
Thank you for your feedback on the offer; we are glad to hear you are excited about joining the team.
You have officially accepted the offer, and we are thrilled to welcome you aboard as a new software engineer.
Your onboarding process has started with introductions to your team and setup of required accounts and devices.
The recruitment case has been successfully closed with your hire fully onboarded and productive.
